thread.title: J. Smith
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by J. Smith

author: J. Smith
title: J. Smith
text: In short, purchased table and piece was missing and they sent a team out to my home twice without the piece that was missing. I was told that I would get the replacement part at the end of January 2016, but in actuallity it was delivered and installed the last week of February 2017.
